testId.description: ID used to locate the element in unit test suites

isReadonly.description: Will show the text area as a normal one, but is not editable and has no shadow

style.description: Custom styling applicable for specific cases

color.description: Color based on bulma's text color tokens

isHovered.description: Will add a specific border when the text area is hovered by the user

isFocused.description: Will add a specific border when the text area is focused by the user

onClick.description: Click function, alone does not nothing, but can be reused for other components
